'''Coral Butterfly''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]]. It can be purchased from [[Chubby]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|x=100}}.

It could first be found throughout the map of [[Three Realms Gateway Offering]] during [[Version 2.5]], where it could be captured via the [[Omni-Ubiquity Net]] to be an outdoor pet for the [[Serenitea Pot]].
